            		ARG 0 level

as the result function only returns this level when the block state has "lit" property's value equal to "true"
createPiston(Block), as this returns a ready-to-go PistonBlock than just a Block/AbstractBlock.Settings
Also createLog(Block), same reasoning as piston, returns a ready-to-go PillarBlock
Same, create(Nether)Stem(Block) (the sound group refers to "nether stem")
